name: AIsland (Hyperur)
description:
In a mysterious island there is a fortess supervised by robots similar to the one who'll help you. What's behind that?

Craft, eat, shoot, kill, explore and discover everything the island as to show to the castaway!

When crafting item fullscreen is recommended to avoid problems, so you have to click esc twice, once to exit the full screen and another time to open the pause menu, finally you have to return the full screen to avoid problems during crafting.

However, to have the best possible gaming experience it is recommended to download the game

Made in 3 days for Wowie jam
